title: Login Issues
body:
Anyone having problem to login? I'm having this "unable to connect to queue" (or something like that) and I did everything I could to fix but I think i couldnt get it right. Anyone have a solution already? Both my accounts with the same issue.
OCE SERVER

replies.body: yeah im still having the same fucking issue.
Im having the same issue, i tried the full repair and isnt working yet, are you guys still having this issue ?
Did something that can help most of u... Go into SETTINGS (gear on top of client) and click on INITIATE A FULL REPAIR..... worked for me just now.
getting the same issue but I can log in via the support go figure.
Yeah. Seems to be fixed just now.
